pkgload::load_all()
x <- mtcars[1:4, 1:5]
tt(x, output = "tblr", inner = "vlines,hlines={dashed,fg=blue}") |>  
  spec_column(1:2, halign = "c", bold = TRUE) |>
  spec_column(4, halign = "r", fg = "blue", wd = "4cm") |>
  spec_row(c(1, 4), bg = "pink", italic = TRUE) |>
  spec_cell(1:2, 1:2, bg = "black", fg = "white") |>
  spec_cell(4, 4, monospace = TRUE, bold = TRUE) |>
  cat()
